name: Raven's Beef Stew
author: Raving Raven
summary: A delicious and easy to make beef stew recipe.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package baby carrots, chopped
directions: Heat the shortening in a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the beef stew meat
Cook and stir until the beef is evenly browned, and no longer pink
Drain and discard any excess grease
Transfer beef to a large pot, and add beef stock, onion, garlic, bay leaves, beef bouillon, salt, and pepper
Cook on medium heat until beef begins to tender, about 1 hour
Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the carrots; cook and stir until the carrots begins to tender
Stir in the potatoes and celery
Continue to cook and stir until all the vegetables are tender
Transfer the vegetables to the large pot
Simmer until the beef is very tender, about 1 hour more
